name: Tyrone Davis
description: '''Tyrone Davis''' (born '''Tyrone D. Fettson''' or '''Tyrone D. Branch''', October 3, 1937 â€“ February 9, 2005) (although many sources have his date of birth as May 4, 1938), was an [[Americans|American]]  [[blues]] and [[soul music|soul]] [[singing|singer]] with a long list of [[hit record]]s over more than 20 years. Davis had three number 1 hits on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[R&B chart]]: "[[Can I Change My Mind]]" (1968), "[[Turn Back the Hands of Time (song)|Turn Back the Hands of Time]]" (1970), and "[[Turning Point (Tyrone Davis song)|Turning Point]]" (1975).
